CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"DTE Axiom"), "Time", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Time Builder"), "Time", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Intapp Time"), "Time", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Integration Builder"), "Integration", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Intapp Open - Conflicts"), "Business Acceptance", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Intapp Open - Intake"), "Business Acceptance", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Wall Builder"), "Confidentiality", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Records Management"), "LegalKey", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"TFG - Other"), "LegalKey", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Flow & Intake Bundle"),"Flow & Intake Bundle", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Intapp Open - Terms of Business"),"Business Acceptance", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c, "Intapp Time - Cloud"), "Time", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"LegalKey"), "LegalKey", IF(CONTAINS(Product_Line__c,"Intapp Open - Experience"), "Experience", "Unknown"))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Product Line - Simple
